gstruct.name: db.query.Editor
gstruct.attr:desc: a proxy to an instance of a connection to a DB server, equivalent to a SQL Editor tab.\n This object cannot be instantiated directly.

member.name: connection
member.attr:desc: connection data

member.name: isConnected
member.attr:desc: whether the editor is connected

member.name: queryEditors
member.attr:desc: list of open editor buffers. This list cannot be modified

member.name: activeQueryEditor
member.attr:desc: query editor that is currently selected

member.name: defaultSchema
member.attr:desc: The default schema to use for queries (equivalent to USE schema)

method.name: executeScript
method.attr:desc: execute the script passed as argument

return.attr:desc: the list of resultsets sent back by the server

method.name: executeScriptAndOutputToGrid
method.attr:desc: execute the script passed as argument and displays the generated resultsets as grids in the UI

method.name: createTableEditResultset
method.attr:desc: executes a SELECT statement on the table and returns an editable resultset that can be used to modify its contents

argument.name: table
argument.attr:desc: name of the table to edit

argument.name: showGrid
argument.attr:desc: whether the resultset should be displayed as a grid in the UI

return.attr:desc: an editable resultset that can be used to modify the table contents

method.name: addToOutput
method.attr:desc: write a line of text into the SQL Editor output area

method.name: addQueryEditor
method.attr:desc: adds a new query buffer/text editor tab in the UI and return it

return.attr:desc: the newly created query buffer proxy object

method.name: editLiveObject
method.attr:desc: Opens the object editor for the given DB object

method.name: alterLiveObject
method.attr:desc: Opens the object editor for the named DB object

method.name: executeManagementQuery
method.attr:desc: Executes a query on the aux connection and return a plain resultset, optionally logging the query in the action log

method.name: executeManagementCommand
method.attr:desc: Executes a statement on the aux connection, optionally logging the query in the action log

method.name: executeQuery
method.attr:desc: Executes a query on the main connection and return a plain resultset, optionally logging the query in the action log

method.name: executeCommand
method.attr:desc: Executes a statement on the main connection, optionally logging the query in the action log

gstruct.name: db.query.QueryBuffer
gstruct.attr:desc: a proxy to a SQL script editor buffer.\n This object cannot be instantiated directly.

member.name: script
member.attr:desc: full contents of the script editor buffer

member.name: selectedText
member.attr:desc: selected text

member.name: currentStatement
member.attr:desc: the SQL statement at current cursor location

member.name: selectionStart
member.attr:desc: starting index of text selection

member.name: selectionEnd
member.attr:desc: ending index of text selection

member.name: insertionPoint
member.attr:desc: gets or sets the position of the current text insertion point (caret/cursor)

method.name: replaceContents
method.attr:desc: replace the contents of the query buffer with the provided text

method.name: replaceSelection
method.attr:desc: replace the currently selected text with the provided one, also selecting it

method.name: replaceCurrentStatement
method.attr:desc: replace the statement text under the cursor with the provided one, also selecting it

member.name: resultPanels
member.attr:desc: list of open query result panels. Result panels contain the resultset grid and other views

member.name: activeResultPanel
member.attr:desc: result panel that is currently selected in UI

gstruct.name: db.query.ResultPanel
gstruct.attr:desc: the GUI object that holds a query resultset and other related things

member.name: resultset
member.attr:desc: the resultset grid. May be NULL

member.name: dockingPoint
member.attr:desc: docking point for plugins to insert new tabs. The string argument of dock_view must point to an icon file.

gstruct.name: db.query.Resultset
gstruct.attr:desc: a query resultset. This object does not allow changes to the resultset, if you need to edit the resultset, see \ref db_query_EditableResultset

member.name: sql
member.attr:desc: the SQL statement that generated this resultset

member.name: columns
member.attr:desc: the columns of the resultset

method.name: goToRow
method.attr:desc: sets the current row pointer to the given index

return.attr:desc: (boolean) 1 on success or 0 if the row number is out of bounds

method.name: goToFirstRow
method.attr:desc: sets the current row index to the 1st

return.attr:desc: (boolean) 1 on success or 0 if the row number is out of bounds

method.name: goToLastRow
method.attr:desc: sets the current row index to the last

return.attr:desc: (boolean) 1 on success or 0 if the row number is out of bounds

method.name: nextRow
method.attr:desc: moves the current row pointer to the next one

return.attr:desc: (boolean) 1 on success or 0 if the new row number is out of bounds

method.name: previousRow
method.attr:desc: moves the current row pointer to the previous one

return.attr:desc: (boolean) 1 on success or 0 if the new row number is out of bounds

method.name: saveFieldValueToFile
method.attr:desc: saves the contents of the field at given column and current row to a file

method.name: intFieldValue
method.attr:desc: returns the integer contents of the field at the given column index and current row

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: stringFieldValue
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column index and current row as a string. If the column type is not string, it will be converted

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: geoStringFieldValue
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column index and current geometry row as a string. If the column type is not geometry or it's empty, it will return empty string

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: geoJsonFieldValue
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column index and current geometry row as a geoJson string. If the column type is not geometry or it's empty, it will return empty string

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: floatFieldValue
method.attr:desc: returns the float contents of the field at the given column index and current row

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: intFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: returns the integer contents of the field at the given column name and current row

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: stringFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column name and current row as a string. If the column type is not string, it will be converted

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: geoStringFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column name and current geometry row as a string. If the column type is not geometry or it's empty, it will return empty string

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: geoJsonFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: returns the contents of the field at the given column name and current geometry row as a geoJson string. If the column type is not geometry or it's empty, it will return empty string

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: floatFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: returns the float contents of the field at the given column name and current row

return.attr:desc: value stored in cell (can be null)

method.name: refresh
method.attr:desc: refreshes the resultset, re-executing the originator query

gstruct.name: db.query.EditableResultset
gstruct.attr:desc: a resultset created for editing table data. Changes made to the resultset are queued to be applied when \ref applyChanges() is called

member.name: schema
member.attr:desc: schema name of the table

member.name: table
member.attr:desc: name of the table being edited

method.name: setFieldNull
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column index to NULL

method.name: setFieldNullByName
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column name to NULL

method.name: setIntFieldValue
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given integer type column index

method.name: setStringFieldValue
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column index

method.name: setFloatFieldValue
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column index

method.name: setIntFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column name

method.name: setStringFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column name

method.name: setFloatFieldValueByName
method.attr:desc: sets the contents of the current row at the given column name

method.name: loadFieldValueFromFile
method.attr:desc: loads the contents of an external file into the current row at the given column index

method.name: addNewRow
method.attr:desc: adds a new empty row to the resultset. The row contents must be set before applying changes

method.name: deleteRow
method.attr:desc: marks a row from the resultset for deletion. The row will only be deleted in the target database when applyChanges() is called

method.name: applyChanges
method.attr:desc: generates a SQL script with all pending changes made to the resultset and executes it, once confirmed through a GUI wizard

method.name: revertChanges
method.attr:desc: discards all changes made to the resultset

member.name: columnType
member.attr:desc: the type of the column, string, int, real, blob, date, time, datetime, geo

gstruct.name: db.query.LiveDBObject
gstruct.attr:desc: object name from a live database

member.name: name
member.attr:desc: name of the object

member.name: type
member.attr:desc: type of the object (schema, table, view, routine)

member.name: schemaName
member.attr:desc: name of the schema the object belongs to
